revised_title: Discovery of the Annual Parallax of a Lyrae
tldr: Dr. John Brinkley, Andrew's Professor of Astronomy in the University of Dublin, reports his discovery of the annual parallax of a Lyrae to Dr. Nevil Maskelyne, Astronomer Royal. Through 47 observations, Brinkley estimates the parallax to be at least 2 arcminutes, and discusses refraction with the co-latitude of the Dublin Observatory using different formulae.
